resources.string: Please select your weapon of choice

In this game you will be playing against the phone! You can pick either rock, paper, scissors, spock or lizard and the phone will make a choice too. 
 
 Rock beats scissors. 
 Lizard paper beats rock and spock. 
 Scissors beat paper and lizard. 
 Lizard beats paper and spock. 
 Spock beats scissors and rock. 
 
 May the best man or machine win!
